version_description:
-Improved Design
-Added Interesting statistics like study streak and total cards mastered
-See who is learning with you in your subjects
-Easily join user-created subjects that interest you
-Tap to zoom images while studying

- Share your Subjects directly with studious friends using Facebook Messenger - no need to annoy all of your friends with a spammy Facebook post
- Minor bug fixes

Now with Knowledge Rehab - Everything you forgot to learn in school & life
Streamlined Subject page.
Destroyed some of those sneaky bugs we all despise

-Cool visual effects encourage you to keep learning
-Ability to remove market subjects from your library
-Performance improvements. Because you can never have enough of those!

-Cool visual effects encourage you to keep learning
-Ability to remove market subjects from your library
-Performance improvements. Because you can never have enough of those!
-iOS 7 users - we've decided to fix a crash for you... BUT SHAME ON YOU FOR NOT UPDATING.

- Reverse your flashcards (Q/A -> A/Q)
- Remove ads
- Study ALL certified content with one Brainscape Pro subscription
- Multiple bug fixes
We heard you didn't like bugs, so we decided to squash a few.  Enjoy the smoother app!

Hey beautiful. You can now ensure that your flashcards are as beautiful as you are, as we've fixed some of the bugs that were jacking up your flashcard formatting. Sorry about that!

You can now also duplicate a subject and shuffle a deck. And we've also made it easier to access certain features by adding an action menu right when you tap a deck, rather than making you initiate a study session first.

Enjoy!
Updated for iOS 10, bug fixes, and answers to the meaning of life.
Changing your class icon is now FREE!

Top-rated flashcard app & website now with millions more classes/cards, a refined Confidence-Based Repetition (CBR) algorithm, & many other tweaks.

Also: Browse mode now free! More slimy bugs eradicated. And better confirmation messaging for Help and Contact Us.

Email us at support@brainscape.zendesk.com anytime to keep us moving forward with your ideas!

- Fixes issue where some people were unable to access Pro features
- Fixes some crashes
- Fixes a privacy loophole
- More cowbell

Top-rated flashcard app & website now with millions more classes/cards, a refined Confidence-Based Repetition (CBR) algorithm, & many other tweaks.

Also: Browse mode now free! More slimy bugs eradicated. And better confirmation messaging for Help and Contact Us.

Email us at support@brainscape.zendesk.com anytime to keep us moving forward with your ideas!
Top-rated flashcard app & website now with even more subjects & flashcards, a smarter spaced repetition algorithm, and smoother user experience.
